text: Hi, am new here, am looking for support with *web hook* app. I tied everything up as expected and did the verification. but linking with my live or demo app seems not succesful. Pls let me know how to proceed

Hey everyone! We're integrating with the HubSpot API at the moment. We run a NoCode development studio in Australia called <http://www.lightningproducts.io|www.lightningproducts.io>

Excited to collaborate and support others in this community.
